Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are buzzing about the upcoming Federal Budget and for good reason. The budget is set to provide significant financial support to single parents and those on Centrelink payments with almost $2 billion set aside for this purpose. High-profile interviews and live coverage are planned making it easier for people to stay informed about budget developments in real-time. With improvements in healthcare and other sectors the budget has the potential to positively impact the economic and social wellbeing of Australians across the country.
